C#版MineLogin官方验证系统的DEMO

string strUsername, strPassword, strSource;strUsername = txtUsername.Text;strPassword = txtPassword.Text;WebClient wClient = new WebClient();if ((strUsername != String.Empty) && (strUsername != String.Empty)){    strSource = wClient.DownloadString("http://login.minecraft.net/?user=" + strUsername + "&password=" + strPassword + "&version=13");    string[] splitUsername = new String[] { ":" };    string[] newSource = strSource.Split(splitUsername, StringSplitOptions.None);    if (newSource[2] == strUsername){       MessageBox.Show("Login Successfully!");    }else{       MessageBox.Show("Bad Login!");    }}else{    MessageBox.Show("Please fill out these two textboxes first.");    Application.Exit();}复制代码
最关键的代码是:
strSource = wClient.DownloadString("http://login.minecraft.net/?user=" + strUsername + "&password=" + strPassword + "&version=13"); 复制代码可以从中看出，MOJANG搞的API是
http://login.minecraft.net?user=用户名&password=密码（明文发送）&version=版本
方法为get，非POST

福利放送完毕，目前在中国，支持MC官方验证系统的第三方启动器应该就只有McLDX(McLauncher Deluxe)了。
